title: vstarry
author: vstarry
content: Hey all,I just deployed a new web3 name service on ethereum, which supports .meta domain name.You can access it here: https://metaid.infoYou will need a browser based cryptocurrency wallet such as Metamask.It is deployed on both Ethereum Mainnet and Goerli Testnet. Users can simply change the Metamask's target net and refresh the page.Currently, it supports ".meta" domain. The ".test" domain is also supported for test purpose.It learns from ens. Extended functions will be online soon.If you have any questions or feedbacks, please kindly let me know.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: 1. Like Unstoppable, it would be nice if users could see if the desired name was available even before connecting their wallet.2. Does the minting process incur external fees in addition to network fees?3. If you have any social media accounts, you can put them somewhere on your website.

comments.author: vstarry
comments.body: Thanks. I'll refine it soon.Quote from: noorman0 on January 10, 2023, 08:40:31 AM1. Like Unstoppable, it would be nice if users could see if the desired name was available even before connecting their wallet.2. Does the minting process incur external fees in addition to network fees?3. If you have any social media accounts, you can put them somewhere on your website.
